text: @jasonrapert @realDonaldTrump How's that #COVID19 treating you?  Feel like working?  Guess what, we shut things down to keep people from getting the virus.  Opening everything just spread it further and made it worse.  You and the rest of the whiny @GOP need to shut up and sit down. And wear a mask

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
